title: The good husvvifes ievvell VVherein is to be found most excellent and rare deuises for conceits in cookerie, found out by the practise of Thomas Dawson. Whereunto is adioyned sundry approued reseits for many soueraine oyles, and the way to distill many precious waters, with diuers approued medicines for many diseases. Also certaine approued points of husbandry, very necessarie for all husbandmen to know.
author: Dawson, Thomas.
publisher: By Iohn Wolfe for Edward White, dwelling at the litle North doore of Paules at the signe of the Gunne,
